items.name: Rosenkreuzstilette Wiki
items.title: Rosenkreuzstilette Wiki
items.headline: The Rosenkreuzstilette Wiki is here for all your RKS needs!
items.desc:
This Wikia covers the games in the Rosenkreuzstilette series as well as several fan materials relating to the series. Rosenkreuzstilette is a series of doujin soft games created by the doujin group [erka:es], taking cues from Capcom's Mega Man franchise, with elements from and references to Konami's Castlevania series and many other titles. The series is known for its Mega Man inspired gameplay as well as its primarily female cast and mystical setting.

This wiki is still in its growing stages, so all help is appreciated! Feel free to contribute in anyway you see fit, whether it is as major as adding translations or as minor as fixing typos. Do not worry about making mistakes, as any errors can be corrected quickly.
